SELECT CUST_CD ,CUST_NM
FROM T_AC0300 WHERE CUST_CD LIKE '%'+#{CUST_CD}+'%' and busi_type Like '%'+#{BUSI_TYPE}+'%' and cust_nm Like '%'+#{CUST_NM}+'%'

SELECT CUST_CD ,CUST_NM ,CUST_PW ,CUST_NM ,BUSI_TYPE ,CUST_GBN ,REPRE_NM ,ZIP_CD ,ADDR ,TEL_NO ,FAX_NO ,BIZ_STAT ,BIZ_ITEM ,REPRE_CUST_CD ,ESTAB_DT ,INFOM_EMP ,HOMEPAGE ,USE_YN ,AUDIT_ID ,CONVERT(VARCHAR,AUDIT_TM,112) AS AUDIT_TM ,BUPIN ,FUND ,BOND ,EMAIL ,DAM_NM ,ISO ,ISNULL(CO_YN,2) AS CO_YN ,CEL_NO ,REGISTER_NO ,BANK_CD ,BANK_ACCNO ,BANK_OWN ,CO_SERVICE FROM T_AC0300 WHERE CUST_CD LIKE '%'+#{CUST_CD}+'%'

SELECT (SELECT ISNULL(K.LEVEL2_NM, '전체') FROM T_SC9100 K WHERE A.CUST_GBN = K.LEVEL2_CD AND (K.BUSI_GB = 'J' AND K.LEVEL1_CD = '200')) AS CUST_GBN, A.CUST_NM,A.CUST_CD, CASE A.BUSI_TYPE WHEN '1' THEN '매입' WHEN '2' THEN '매출' WHEN '3' THEN '기타' ELSE '' END AS BUSI_TYPE, A.REPRE_NM, ISNULL((CASE SUBSTRING(LTRIM(A.TEL_NO),1,1) WHEN '0' THEN LTRIM(A.TEL_NO) WHEN '-' THEN '' ELSE LTRIM(A.TEL_NO) END),'') AS TEL_NO , ISNULL((LTRIM(A.FAX_NO)),'') AS FAX_NO, ISNULL(A.ZIP_CD,'') AS ZIP_CD, A.ADDR, ISNULL(CASE C.KUN_CORP_YN WHEN '0' THEN 'N' WHEN '1' THEN 'Y' END ,'')AS KUN_CORP_YN, ISNULL(C.SVC_CLASS,'') AS SVC_CLASS, ISNULL((SELECT H.LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 H WHERE C.SVC_PART1 = H.LEVEL2_CD AND (H.BUSI_GB = 'J' AND H.LEVEL1_CD = '220')),'') AS SVC_PART1_NM, ISNULL((SELECT I.LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 I WHERE C.SVC_PART2 = I.LEVEL2_CD AND (I.BUSI_GB = 'J' AND I.LEVEL1_CD = '220')),'') AS SVC_PART2_NM, ISNULL((SELECT J.LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 J WHERE C.SVC_PART3 = J.LEVEL2_CD AND (J.BUSI_GB = 'J' AND J.LEVEL1_CD = '220')),'') AS SVC_PART3_NM, CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) AS DATE FROM T_AC0300 A, T_PP2100 C WHERE A.CUST_CD *= C.CUST_CD AND A.CUST_GBN LIKE '%'+#{CUST_GBN}+'%'
${NMCD_TYPE}
